00001 #include "QuadTree.h"
00002 #include "QuadTreeNode.h"
00003 #include "BoundedObject.h"
00004 #include "BoundingBox.h"
00005 #include "Vector2D.h"
00006 
00007 using namespace std;
00008 
00009 namespace jvgs
00010 {
00011     namespace math
00012     {
00013         QuadTree::QuadTree(vector<BoundedObject*> *objects, int subdivideLimit)
00014         {
00015             this->subdivideLimit = subdivideLimit;
00016 
00017             /* Initialize bounding box. */
00018             Vector2D topLeft, bottomRight;
00019             vector<BoundedObject*>::iterator iterator = objects->begin();
00020             if(objects->begin() != objects->end()) {
00021 
00022                 topLeft = (*iterator)->getBoundingBox()->getTopLeft();
00023                 bottomRight = (*iterator)->getBoundingBox()->getBottomRight();
00024                 
00025                 /* Expand bounding box. */
00026                 for(iterator++; iterator != objects->end(); iterator++) {
00027                     BoundingBox *boundingBox = (*iterator)->getBoundingBox();
00028 
00029                     if(boundingBox->getTopLeft().getX() < topLeft.getX())
00030                         topLeft.setX(boundingBox->getTopLeft().getX());
00031                     if(boundingBox->getBottomRight().getX() >
00032                             bottomRight.getX())
00033                         bottomRight.setX(boundingBox->getBottomRight().getX());
00034 
00035                     if(boundingBox->getTopLeft().getY() < topLeft.getY())
00036                         topLeft.setY(boundingBox->getTopLeft().getY());
00037                     if(boundingBox->getBottomRight().getY() >
00038                             bottomRight.getY())
00039                         bottomRight.setY(boundingBox->getBottomRight().getY());
00040                 }
00041 
00042                 root = new QuadTreeNode(this, 
00043                         new BoundingBox(topLeft, bottomRight));
00044                 for(iterator = objects->begin(); iterator != objects->end();
00045                         iterator++) {
00046                     root->addObject(*iterator);
00047                 }
00048 
00049             /* No objects. */
00050             } else {
00051                 root = 0;
00052             }
00053         }
00054 
00055         QuadTree::~QuadTree()
00056         {
00057             if(root)
00058                 delete root;
00059         }
00060 
00061         int QuadTree::getSubdivideLimit() const
00062         {
00063             return subdivideLimit;
00064         }
00065 
00066         void QuadTree::findObjects(BoundingBox *boundingBox,
00067                 std::vector<BoundedObject*> *result) const
00068         {
00069             if(root)
00070                 root->findObjects(boundingBox, result);
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }
